#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

int main()
{
    long long i,m,n,a,maxi;
    bool flag = 0;
    scanf("%lld %lld",&m,&n);
    if(n%2)
        maxi = n/2 + 1;
    else
        maxi = n/2;
    for(i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&a);
        if(a>maxi)
            flag = 1;
    }
    if(flag)
        printf("NO\n");
    else
        printf("YES\n");
}
